CustomField.description: The application control associated with this external application. Assigning an app control here will prevent an applicant from starting an application in the associated app control and direct them to claim the external app.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The application control associated with this external application. Assigning an app control here will prevent an applicant from starting an application in the associated app control and direct them to claim the external app.
CustomField.label: External App Associated App Control
